summary:

body:
Stephen: One time I had to perform mouth to mouth resuscitation.
Tony: I was just sleeping.
Stephen: Oh no Tony, you drowned again for the second time today, let me help you.
Tony: LET ME NAP

summary: Okay, so you give me a Carol headcanon.
question: Okay, so you give me a Carol headcanon.
answer:
Carol gets parenting advise from Tony after she starts repeatedly running into Kamala Khan.

The first few times, it’s like “Oh nice I have A Big Fan”, but when Carol starts noticing that a) Kamala keeps being there and b) Kamala has powers, well, Carol is a little lost.

And sure, sure, Maria would have proper being-a-parent-advise, but Kamala does already have parents. What Carol needs is “I accidentally kind of adopted a young superhero”-parenting advise.

Because MCU!Carol would definitely be kind of lost when there was suddenly a teen worshipping the ground she’s walking on??

(Kamala and Peter become best friends while their superhero parents figure shit out.)

question: 📂
answer:
Thanks for asking! Leaving me to decide what kinda headcanon… oh dear. :D” *weeps*

Thor is obsessed with Pikachu after Darcy introduces him to the little yellow electronic mouse. He is absolutely devastated when Jane tells him that Pokémon aren’t real and he can’t actually have a Pikachu.

(Tony builds him a robot Pikachu with a simplistic AI and Thor is over the moon with excitement! ^o^)

summary:
Tony waking up: What happen?
Stephen: You were in a coma.
Tony: Why?
Stephen: Peter dared you to drink red bull and monster...
body:
Tony waking up: What happen?
Stephen: You were in a coma.
Tony: Why?
Stephen: Peter dared you to drink red bull and monster mixed together. I said don't do that and you proceeded to drink.
Tony: Oh...how long was I out then?
Stephen: 2 and half weeks.
Tony: Huh well you can't say I didn't sleep-
Stephen: You needed a  liver transplant too

question: 📂
answer:
Thanks for asking! But aaah. I am so bad at making decision. No ship or fandom or character. I have to decide? I am so bad at this. :O

Oookay super random Nebula headcanon:

She understands the bots. It’s part of her cyborg self, she can actually understand what Tony’s bots are saying since their chirping does translate to something and they are sentient.

So after their stint in space together, when the dust settles and the battle is over, the first time Nebula is at Tony’s workshop for a little maintenance, they realize she can speak to the bots.

They adopt her as their new big sister. She is touched and confused and also very in awe that Tony managed to create sentient artificial intelligences on a planet that is so behind on technology.

summary: Because I’m not seeing it for the first couple of days because of work and things, when somebody following this page sees the...
body: Because I’m not seeing it for the first couple of days because of work and things, when somebody following this page sees the movie; could you please be so kind as to drop spoilers into my inbox? Ie. Who doesn’t make it/important events for character dev. etc? I need to prep myself for what happens before hand because I know my anxiety won’t cope and I’ll have a fucking panic attack during the movie if one of my attached characters (Bruce, Tony (Pepper by proxy) and Rocket, tbh. Not THAT bothered about the others :/ ) seems to be heading towards a heroic death sequence. I know it doesn’t seem especially important, in the grand scheme of things, but I have a lot on my back and the little things tend to be the straws that break it :(

summary: Let Me Show You the World in My Eyes
title: Let Me Show You the World in My Eyes
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2CH8tCD

by amethyst-noir (Arbonne)

Stephen’s beautiful, no doubt about that. Too bad that Stephen himself doesn’t see it that way - but Tony is determined and prepared to use any means necessary to make him see the truth. And if that involves magic? So be it.

title: Surprise! You're an Uncle
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Jwa9ol

by talkaboutartassholes

“Tony.” He started calmly as he glanced at his friend, “Why is there a child in your lab?”

“That’s Peter.” Tony said, as if that explained anything.

Rhodey fixed him with his best Not Amused look, “He’s 12, Tones.”

–OR–

Rhodey meets Peter

blog.name: amethyst-noir
blog.title: Whatever it takes. 🌙
blog.description:
🦋
99% Ironstrange | drpepperony is 💞 | sometimes i write | sometimes i just imagine things | my inbox is always open | Arbonne@AO3 | cute chibi!stephen commissioned from @descaladumidera | beautiful header by @ironstrange-is-the-endgame
💫

summary: I headcanon that Stephen was rarely told he was beautiful by anyone. There was always something, mainly regarding his face, that...
question: I headcanon that Stephen was rarely told he was beautiful by anyone. There was always something, mainly regarding his face, that just wasn’t right to people. So whenever Tony (obviously) tells him he’s gorgeous, he just kind of, short circuits and stares at Tony is confusion. And it just breaks Tony’s heart every time.
answer:
That’s… not okay! Stephen is beautiful and there was no better way to show him that than the Ironstrange Bingo square “Mind Link” to show him how beautiful he is in Tony’s eyes.

So this starts sexy, quickly descends into a bit of angst angst, before getting fluffy romantic, and then ends on a sexy note. (Read the tags on AO3 for further information.)

You’re welcome. 💝

Let Me Show You the World in My Eyes

(AO3, 2.816 words)

“You mean I’m prettier than Nebula?”

“And Mantis. And Gamora. And Thor. And Loki. And all the others.”

“It’s good to know that there are a few men and also human looking ones among your list or I would have to be concerned.”

Fun banter was good, yes, but damn it to hell, he still wasn’t getting through to Stephen!

Fun banter was good, yes, but damn it to hell, he still wasn’t getting through to Stephen!

trail.content_raw:
That’s… not okay! Stephen is beautiful and there was no better way to show him that than the Ironstrange Bingo square “Mind Link” to show him how beautiful he is in Tony’s eyes.

So this starts sexy, quickly descends into a bit of angst angst, before getting fluffy romantic, and then ends on a sexy note. (Read the tags on AO3 for further information.)

You’re welcome. 💝

Let Me Show You the World in My Eyes

(AO3, 2.816 words)

“You mean I’m prettier than Nebula?”

“And Mantis. And Gamora. And Thor. And Loki. And all the others.”

“It’s good to know that there are a few men and also human looking ones among your list or I would have to be concerned.”

Fun banter was good, yes, but damn it to hell, he still wasn’t getting through to Stephen!
trail.content:
That’s… not okay! Stephen is beautiful and there was no better way to show him that than the Ironstrange Bingo square “Mind Link” to show him how beautiful he is in Tony’s eyes.

So this starts sexy, quickly descends into a bit of angst angst, before getting fluffy romantic, and then ends on a sexy note. (Read the tags on AO3 for further information.)

You’re welcome. 💝

Let Me Show You the World in My Eyes

(AO3, 2.816 words)

“You mean I’m prettier than Nebula?”

“And Mantis. And Gamora. And Thor. And Loki. And all the others.”

“It’s good to know that there are a few men and also human looking ones among your list or I would have to be concerned.”

Fun banter was good, yes, but damn it to hell, he still wasn’t getting through to Stephen!

summary: Surprise! You're an Uncle - talkaboutartassholes - Multifandom [Archive of Our Own]
title: Surprise! You're an Uncle - talkaboutartassholes - Multifandom [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man - All Media Types, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Iron Man (Movies)
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & James “Rhodey” Rhodes, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark
Characters: Peter Parker, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Tony Stark
Additional Tags: Iron Dad, James “Rhodey” Rhodes is a Good Bro, Identity Reveal
Series: Part 1 of Everybody, Meet Peter
Summary:

“Tony.” He started calmly as he glanced at his friend, “Why is there a child in your lab?”

“That’s Peter.” Tony said, as if that explained anything.

Rhodey fixed him with his best Not Amused look, “He’s 12, Tones.”

–OR–

Rhodey meets Peter

blog.name: brucebannerblr
blog.title: bruciebear
blog.description: Bruce Banner deserves love and affection. Best served by his science husband. Taking drabble requests.

tags: 2012 bonding nights because i am still deep in denial
title: Bruce Week Day 4: Wonder & Game
body:
When Bruce was ten, he got a board game called “Guess Who?” for his birthday. It was brand new back then, just published, and his mother paid more for it than she could probably afford. It was probably also a bit too childish for Bruce, who was ten and advanced for his age, but he loved the game to pieces.

On some gloomy mornings, when Brian wasn’t home, Rebecca would sit and play with him, and Bruce cherished every game with her. They played thirteen games before summer came and Rebecca tried to run away with Bruce, and Brian killed her. When Brian was locked up and Bruce went to live with the Walters’, he took the game with him.

It took three years before Jen found it and asked him to play. He looked at the box, still looking new and carrying too many memories and he got mad, threw her out, and cried the whole evening. When she came to apologize the next day, he offered to play with her himself. When he went on the run, he sneaked back to his old flat for the game that was full of memories of his mother and Jen.

Every time, when running, he would make sure the game was safe somewhere, and every time he would come back for it.

When he moved into The Tower, he put it on a shelf and he felt strangely settled, having it there like that, for the first time since it was in his and Jen’s room. He felt like it belonged on that shelf the way he belonged in that room.

So well. Bruce wouldn’t say he was a fan of board games. He liked them just fine, but that one? He loved that one. Still, when Tony announced a board game team evening, Bruce couldn’t help but smile.

They all ended up sprawled around the living room, bowl of popcorn laying around because popcorn was a part of bonding nights even if movies weren’t involved, and Tony brought a huge stack of board games. Or to be precise, he brought a huge stack of Avengers licensed board games.

Steve was staring at them as if he wasn’t sure if they were real or just Tony’s home made prank, Natasha kept stuffing herself with popcorn with mild interest, Clint looked excited as he started talking to Tony about the titles and Thor laughed.

Bruce smiled, and started shuffling the boxes, checking what games there were. He passes a Rummikub (seriously? How do you make a themed Rummikub? Marketing was amazing) and Monopoly, which quickly gets snatched by still over-hyped Clint, and then he sees it.

This box looks just the same but he’s the one on the cards and there’s Clint, and Tony, and Steve, even Rhodey and other superheroes. There’s Matt and Jen and Jessica and there’s Charles and Eric and Ororo… Bruce feels an elbow nudge in his side and turns to find Tony smiling at him.

“Wanna play?”

“It’s a two person game, Tony. It’s a team night.”

“Hey, it’s fine.” Tony smiles and Bruce feels so grateful for the friendship, the home Tony offered him, all of them, here. “The other decided on Monopoly and I loathe Monopoly plus it’s best for four players. Let’s let them have fun explaining it to Thor and we enjoy describing ourselves, hmm?”

Bruce wants to make a jab how of course Tony loves a game that allows him to focus on who he is but decides not to be an asshole. Especially since he knows Tony too well now.

“Wait, you hate Monopoly?”

“I got enough of business with Pep every day, I’d rather keep it away from my entertainment. So you up for a game of Guess Who: Our Beautiful Superhero Faces?”

Bruce fondly shook his head at Tony and stares at the box with wonder feeling childish joy rise in his chest, and he let it.

“You know what? I am.”

summary:
lemme see avengers displaying their cultures
lemme see christian/catholic steve celebrating st patrick’s day (non-american...
body:
lemme see avengers displaying their cultures

lemme see christian/catholic steve celebrating st patrick’s day (non-american style), lemme see jewish bucky and wanda, lemme see natasha making borscht and napoleon cakes for everybody, lemme see clint blasting “country roads” unironically, lemme see sam and rhodey making everybody soul food and blasting mary i blige lemme see the Culture™️
